official_title: A bill to prohibit the exportation of raw steel and semiprocessed steel until the President determines that a shortage of such items no longer exists.

summary.text: Prohibits the exportation of raw steel and semiprocessed steel until the President determines that a shortage of such items no longer exists.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the exportation of raw steel and semiprocessed steel until the President determines that a shortage of such items no longer exists.
